content:
Hey <@&1416139337179074590>, I was exploring the tooling wishlist and have started exploring the debugger agent. I had a questions regarding the implementation:
Should this be implemented specifically as for Claude code or as a more generic MCP service that any AI model can integrate with? Also like we are supposed  use the existing skills present and follow the same pattern as in ai cookbook if we are making it as a claude code only
